snippet: New York City Opera was once the smaller, bolder company in Manhattan. It remains smaller, but not always bolder and not always in Manhattan.
abstract: New York City Opera was once the smaller, bolder company in Manhattan, but is now having trouble defining its artistic mission and its role in the world of opera; general manager George Steel has been unable to give the company a clear profile, even while making bold changes and bringing tireless enthusiasm to the organization.
lead_paragraph: New York City Opera was once the smaller, bolder company in Manhattan. It remains smaller, but not always bolder and not always in Manhattan.

headline.seo: Identity Shifts for New York City Opera
headline.main: City Opera, Haunted by Its Past
headline.print_headline: City Opera, Haunted By Its Past
